org.openliberty.openaz.pdp.provider
Class DirectConcreteSunXacmlService

java.lang.Object
  org.openliberty.openaz.pdp.AzRequestContextFactoryImpl
      org.openliberty.openaz.pdp.AbstractService
          org.openliberty.openaz.pdp.provider.DirectConcreteSunXacmlService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzRequestContextFactory, AzService
public class DirectConcreteSunXacmlService
extends AbstractService

SunXacml service provider implementation. This class will use direct org.openliberty.openaz.pdp.provider.sunxacml classes to implement the AzService SunXacml does not have a class corresponding to AzRequestContext, which can hold multiple requests. The SunXacml classes start with the AzResourceAction association which corresponds to the SunXacml RequestCtx. This class is called by AzApi, converts the AzRequestContext to the sunxacml RequestCtx, calls the sunxacml service and takes the returned sunxacml ResponseCtx and converts it to an AzApi AzResponseContext and returns.

This module uses the SunXacml SimplePDP.java sample as a guide.

Author:
rlevinson

decide

public AzResponseContext decide(AzRequestContext azReqCtx)
Description copied from interface: AzService
Returns the authorization decision(s) in an AzResponseContext object.

There will be one AzDecision contained in an AzResult object in the AzResponseContext object, where one AzResult/AzDecision corresponds to one AzResourceActionAssociation contained in the submitted AzRequestContext object.

Parameters:
azReqCtx - an azRequestContext that has been prepared to contain the request information needed for one or more authorization decisions
Returns:
an azResponseContext that contains all the authorization decisions corresponding to the one or more requests that were provided in the azRequestContext

query

public java.util.Set<AzResourceActionAssociation> query(java.lang.String scope,
                                                        AzRequestContext azRequestContext,
                                                        boolean allowedNotAllowed)
Description copied from interface: AzService
Returns the set of AzResourceActionAssociations that are allowed (or not allowed, depending on boolean below) for the specified "scope", where "scope" is a String expression representing a set of target resources.
The specific format of "scope" is based on how the resources and actions are represented within the Policy definitions on the PDP.

Parameters:
scope - PDP policy-specific resource representation
azRequestContext - only the AzEnvironment and AzSubject entities will be considered in the evaluation
allowedNotAllowed - true: return allowed results; false: return the not-allowed results.
Returns:
a set of azResourceActionAssociations representing the allowed (or not-allowed)resource-actions within the requested scope.

queryVerbose

public AzResponseContext queryVerbose(java.lang.String scope,
                                      AzRequestContext azRequestContext)
Description copied from interface: AzService
Returns an AzResponseContext that contains all the results for queries that are within the specified "scope", where "scope" is a String expression representing a set of target resources.

The AzResponseContext will contain full information including Obligations for each request within the scope.

Parameters:
scope - PDP policy-specific resource representation
azRequestContext - only the AzEnvironment and AzSubject entities will be considered in the evaluation
Returns:
azResponseContext with AzDecision and all info for resource-actions within the requested scope.
